Name: Alpacalypse
About the game: Story Pancake The Llama is a humble pig farmer who lives with his wife, The Mrs The Llama. One day The Llama's lives are turned upside down when The Mrs is stolen by a nasty corporate alpaca gang. Now, Pancake must go on a journey to rescue his wife from the evil clutches of the alpacas. Game Features Play as Pancake The Llama on a quest to save The Mrs. Kick, spit, and jump through 10 hand crafted levels. An open level concept lets you take on each level in whatever order you choose. Face off against a horde of alpacas, featuring 2 unique boss fights. About Development Alpaclypse was designed, developed, and released by a team of five students at Neumont College of Computer Science during a 10 week project course. The Team Gus McGuire Mark Nusser Logan Bailey Hailey White Alan Buechner
Developers: Gus McGuire,Mark Nusser,Logan Bailey,Hailey White,Alan Buechner
